name: Skånska Diving Company
obverse: A bird in flight surrounded by a wreath.
reverse: The word 'Priset' is surrounded by a wreath. There is a space above meant to hold '1', '2', or '3' to indicate the place of the award recipient.
description: Created by Fr. Schmahlfeld who was employed by jeweler V. Christesen in Copenhagen as the emblem of the Skånska Diving Company.
The Skånska Diving Company was founded in Lund in 1875 and dissolved shortly after 1881.
